views.markdown:
I have come across many applications that block the use of AirPlay. For example, you may notice the app for your TV Provider gives you an error when attempting to AirPlay a live channel. This is where PremiumPlay comes in. PremiumPlay forces certain apps to allow you to AirPlay its content.





No options to configure.

No Screenshots for this item.
Add support to NFL app, add hopeful support to a handful of others (see compatibility list for details)
